downloadTitle: Microsoft FAST Search Server 2010 for SharePoint Management Pack for Operations Manager 2007
downloadDescription: A System Center Operations Manager management pack for Microsoft FAST Search Server 2010 for SharePoint.

downloadFile.name: FAST Search Server 2010 for SharePoint OpsMgr 2007 MP.msi
downloadFile.url: https://download.microsoft.com/download/e/7/8/e7859ce0-8227-403a-b98f-0f9161dbf5c6/FAST Search Server 2010 for SharePoint OpsMgr 2007 MP.msi

downloadFile.name: Microsoft FAST Search Server 2010 for SharePoint Management Pack Guide.doc
downloadFile.url: https://download.microsoft.com/download/e/7/8/e7859ce0-8227-403a-b98f-0f9161dbf5c6/Microsoft FAST Search Server 2010 for SharePoint Management Pack Guide.doc

detailsSection:
This management pack monitors the health state of the components in your FAST Search Server 2010 for SharePoint environment that affect performance and availability. When there is an issue that may cause service or performance degradation, System Center Operations Manager 2007 uses the management pack to detect the issue, alert you to its existence, facilitate its diagnosis and suggest corrective actions.

Feature Summary
The monitored objects include:
  • FAST Search Server 2010 for SharePoint services and processes
  • FAST Search Server 2010 for SharePoint event log entries
  • Performance counters and WMI data
Release History
  • 4/14/2010 - Original release, version 14.0.19.1000

systemRequirementsSection:
• Other Software:
    • System Center Operations Manager 2007 SP1 or R2
    • Microsoft FAST Search Server 2010 for SharePoint
installInstructionSection:
1. Click the Download button on this page to start the download.
  2. Do one of the following:
    • To start the installation immediately, click Run.
    • To save the download to your computer for installation at a later time, click Save.
    • To cancel the installation, click Cancel.
